meanings.definition: The quality of being deceitful or deceptive.
meanings.sent1: Her deceitfulnesses were evident in the way she lied about her whereabouts.
meanings.sent2: The detective uncovered the deceitfulnesses of the con artist's schemes.
meanings.sent3: Despite his deceitfulnesses, he couldn't fool his loyal dog who always knew when he was up to no good.
meanings.sent4: The web of deceitfulnesses spun by the villain ensnared even the most cautious of individuals.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of deceitfulnesses clouded the once clear path to trust.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of deceiving.
meanings.sent1: The deceitfulnesses of the scammer left many victims in financial ruin.
meanings.sent2: Deceitfulnesses in politics can erode public trust in government institutions.
meanings.sent3: The magician's deceitfulnesses on stage always left the audience in awe of his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The deceitfulnesses of the mirage in the desert played tricks on the weary traveler's eyes.
meanings.sent5: The deceitfulnesses of the mirror maze confused even the most astute visitors.
